original_text: And he received the sign of circumcision, a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised: that he might be the father of all them that believe, though they be not circumcised; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also:
korean_text: 그가 할례의 표를 받은 것은 무할례시에 믿음으로 된 의를 인친 것이니 이는 무할례자로서 믿는 모든 자의 조상이 되어 그들도 의로 여기심을 얻게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: And he received the sign of circumcision
a seal of the righteousness of the faith
which he had yet being uncircumcised
that he might be the father of all them that believe
sentences.korean_translation: 그로 하여금 믿는 모든 자의 아비가 되게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: that righteousness might be imputed unto them also
